channel.title: Save On The Prada PR 15LV | Prada VPR15L
channel.description: A leather goods business was started in Milan in 1913 by Mario and Martino Prada. The shop was called ‘Fratelli Prada’ or ‘Prada Brothers’ in English, and they sold English imported steamer trunks and women’s handbags. Mario was very much a man of his time and prevented his female family from joining the business. Ironically, [...]

item.title: Save On The Prada PR 15LV | Prada VPR15L
item.description:
A leather goods business was started in Milan in 1913 by Mario and Martino Prada. The shop was called ‘Fratelli Prada’ or ‘Prada Brothers’ in English, and they sold English imported steamer trunks and women’s handbags. Mario was very much a man of his time and prevented his female family from joining the business. Ironically, [...]
